title: St. Louis Cardinals Font - What is this font?
content:
Hi there, I was trying to figure out what type of font this is that is surrounding the logo of St. Louis Cardinals?! Much help to those able to assist me in this, initially I thought it was Copperplate Light but that clearly isn't it! Thanks again!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414014727im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cards_5574.png)
author: Smeesters
